author: nick
msg: Review SimpleDateFormat use, adding comments where OK or potentially an issue, for TIKA-1387

author: nick
msg: For places formatting numbers in fixed formats, or case-insensitive comparing Ascii strings, use Locale.ROOT not Locale.getDefault() to ensure predictable behaviour, and avoid issues in locales like Turkish. TIKA-1387
